course_title: Special Topics in Kinesiology - SPEC TPCS KIN

sections.comments: Special Topics: Neurophysiology of Human Movement. Critical review and in-depth discussion of research literature on the sensori-motor control of human balance. Topics include: the biomechanical and neuro-physiological factors contributing to healthy static and dynamic balance control, techniques and tools used to measure human balance, and functional outcomes associated with balance disorders due to age and disease.**Class is scheduled for online delivery. Course is taught with KIN 313. Course outline may be found under "Graduate Course" at: http://kin.educ.ubc.ca/current-students/current-graduate-students/#Courses-0
